item.title: Judge orders Trump administration to fund full SNAP benefits, rebukes Trump
item.description: A federal judge has ordered the Trump administration to make a payment to fully fund SNAP for the month of November by tomorrow.

item.title: How Mamdani clinched the votes of young people, newcomers to NYC
item.description: Exit polls revealed Mamdani captured the majority of votes from the younger population and newcomers to the city.

item.title: Supreme Court allows Trump to end passport gender marker policy
item.description: The 6-3 decision by the Court's conservative majority overrides two lower court decisions

item.title: WATCH: Nancy Pelosi announces her retirement from Congress
item.description: ABC News’ Jay O’Brien talks about what Congress would look like after Pelosi leaves office in 2027: “We don't know what will happen now with this seat...

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
